guaranteeTerms.name: Availability
guaranteeTerms.definition: 5GTANGO Service Platform will use commercially reasonable efforts to make the offered Network Services available with Availability of at least 99.999%. SLA service level of 99.999% NS availability gives the period of approximately downtime/unavailability of 0.0001s in a 1m period. In the event any of the included Network Services do not meet the service level, the SLA is violated.
